 2008-08722008-05-09TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment of IRIS G. PETTEN of Conception Bay South, Newfoundland and Labrador, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Ernest J. Brennan, effective May 19, 2008.
